title: Drama, My Favorite Nephew
description: Meet Drama, a young man troubled by his environment as well as by the company that he keeps. Orion & Croc are into all of the wrong things and don't seem to want the best for their comrade. When Butter enters the scene, things get even more complex. Her father is an incognito gangster with the power to make many things happen with ease. And in the shadows lurks...a huntress. All of this novella is told through the voice of the very funny and wise Uncle Raymond. Definitely something fresh, enjoyable, and well worth the price!
author: Jaree Francis
